title: ATLAS Upgrade 2012
abstractText: Refer to ATLAS-UK upgrade proposal to PPRP: "UPGRADING THE ATLAS EXPERIMENT FOR THE LUMINOSITY FRONTIER AT THE LARGE HADRON COLLIDER" PPRP meeting, September 2012
impactText:
Proton therapy and establishing UK lead in HL-LHC programme.
Development of highly radiation-hard sensors with UK industry. Electronics,Healthcare Societal,Economic
